name: Light Dragon Wyrmling
description: A medium-sized dragon known for its benevolent nature and strong affinity for radiant energy, capable of flying and shedding bright light.
memorable: The Light Dragon Wyrmling possesses powerful breath weapons that can blind foes and turn undead, making it formidable in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to protect the innocent and combat evil, especially undead creatures.
relations: Often interacts with other benevolent beings and can be in the company of other dragons.
environment: Can be found in areas where good is prevalent, often associated with natural light or places of purity.
strengths: Immunity to radiant damage and resistance to nonmagical physical attacks, along with powerful radiant breath and blinding features.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to any non-radiant damage types, particularly from magic or strong opponents.
attacks: Utilizes a bite attack and possesses two breath weapons, one dealing radiant damage and the other blinding enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Flaring Breath can blind enemies and turn undead, presenting a significant tactical advantage.
senses: Has blindsight extending 10 feet, aiding in its perception of surroundings even in darkness.
skills: Skilled in perception, with a notable modifier enhancing its vigilance.
additional_information: Illumination ability sheds light in dim places.
Incorporeal Movement allows it to pass through objects.
Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.
test_queries: medium dragon with powerful radiant breath
dragon that can blind and turn undead
dragon known for fighting evil and undead
